TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供授权事件的上下文信息。

span.span: Provides context information of an authorization event.

summary.span: 这包括表示该调用方的主体，请求的资源和执行的操作。

span.span: This includes the principal that represents the caller, the resource that is being requested, and the action that is being performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示声明授权管理器的实现使用的上下文类中，以确定是否应授权主体 （主题） 以给定资源上执行指定的操作。The class represents the context that is used by a claims authorization manager, an implementation of the class, to determine whether a principal (subject) should be authorized to perform a specified action on a given resource. 声明授权管理器的计算结果中的授权上下文方法并拒绝或基于声明的授予访问权限提供的主体。The claims authorization manager evaluates the authorization context in the method and either denies or grants access based on the claims presented by the principal. 属性包含为其正在请求授权、 主体属性包含在其主体正在获得授权时，资源和属性包含的操作，主体打算对资源执行。The property contains the principal for which authorization is being requested, the property contains the resource on which the principal is being authorized, and the property contains the actions that the principal intends to perform on the resource. 资源和操作都表示为的声明; 的集合但是，在大多数情况下，每个集合包含单个声明。Both the resource and the action are represented as a collection of claims; however, in most cases, each collection contains a single claim. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Claims Based Authorization`示例。The code example that is used in the topic is taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此示例提供的自定义声明授权管理器，可以授权基于策略在配置中指定的主题。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 此自定义管理器包括三个基本组件： 派生自该类实现管理器中，`ResourceAction`类对资源和操作，并读取和编译中指定的策略的策略读取器配置文件。This custom manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此编译的策略可能然后声明授权管理器用于评估来为对资源的访问授权的主体。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 不是所有元素都均出现由于篇幅所限。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示自定义声明授权管理器的方法。The following code shows the method for the custom claims authorization manager. 主体的计算结果的函数基于资源和操作中指定调用。A function that evaluates the principal based on the resource and action specified in the is invoked. 此函数返回`true`或`false`，其中授予或拒绝对主体访问。This function returns either `true` or `false`, which either grants or denies access to the principal. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#5)] 下面的 XML 演示在配置中指定的授权策略的一个示例。The following XML shows an example of the authorization policy that was specified in configuration. 在第一个策略中，主体必须具有一个指定的声明，以对指定资源执行指定的操作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二个策略中，主体必须具有两个声明要能够指定资源执行指定的操作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 所有其他情况下，主体是自动授予访问权限而不考虑它拥有的声明。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ```xml ... ```
